resources.string:
-Added new language - Indonesian. 
 -Added new report: Budget - Pie chart. 
 -Added the average value and the value of the last month to the "Add value" dialog box on the budget screen. 
 -Fixed bugs.
-Added new widget - Add a transaction. \n -Added new option for automatic synchronization with Dropbox.
-Added new report - Comparison of the expenses by the months. \n -Fixed bugs.
